    CodecZlib.DeflateCompressor — Type.
    DeflateCompressor(;level=-1, windowbits=-1)

    Create a deflate compression codec.

    Arguments

    • level: compression level (-1..9)
    • windowbits: size of history buffer (8..15)
    CodecZlib.DeflateCompressorStream — Type.
    DeflateCompressorStream(stream::IO; kwargs...)

    Create a deflate compression stream (see DeflateCompressor for kwargs).

    CodecZlib.DeflateDecompressor — Type.
    DeflateDecompressor(;windowbits=15)

    Create a deflate decompression codec.

    Arguments

    • windowbits: size of history buffer (8..15)
    CodecZlib.DeflateDecompressorStream — Type.
    DeflateDecompressorStream(stream::IO; kwargs...)

    Create a deflate decompression stream (see DeflateDecompressor for kwargs).

    CodecZlib.GzipCompressor — Type.
    GzipCompressor(;level=-1, windowbits=15)

    Create a gzip compression codec.

    Arguments

    • level: compression level (-1..9)
    • windowbits: size of history buffer (8..15)
    CodecZlib.GzipCompressorStream — Type.
    GzipCompressorStream(stream::IO; kwargs...)

    Create a gzip compression stream (see GzipCompressor for kwargs).

    CodecZlib.GzipDecompressor — Type.
    GzipDecompressor(;windowbits=15, gziponly=false)

    Create a gzip decompressor codec.

    If gziponly is false, this codec can decompress the zlib format as well.

    Arguments

    • windowbits: size of history buffer (8..15)
    • gziponly: flag to inactivate data format detection
    CodecZlib.GzipDecompressorStream — Type.
    GzipDecompressorStream(stream::IO; kwargs...)

    Create a gzip decompression stream (see GzipDecompressor for kwargs).

    CodecZlib.ZlibCompressor — Type.
    ZlibCompressor(;level=-1, windowbits=15)

    Create a zlib compression codec.

    Arguments

    • level: compression level (-1..9)
    • windowbits: size of history buffer (8..15)
